title: Cristiano Ronaldo misses Real Madrid training to spark fitness fears ahead of Champions League clash with Napoli
text:
Sport Cristiano Ronaldo misses Real Madrid training to spark fitness fears ahead of Champions League clash with Napoli Ronaldo completed 90 minutes for Madrid in La Liga on Saturday and trained without a hitch on Sunday but was nowhere to be seen as Zinedine Zidane put his players through their paces on Monday Share Cristiano Ronaldo has sparked fitness fears ahead of Real Madrid's game against Napoli (Photo: AFP) Share Get Real Madrid CF   Thank you for subscribing!   
Cristiano Ronaldo didn't train with his Real Madrid teammates on Monday, sparking fitness concerns ahead of Los Merengues' Champions League clash with Napoli. 
Instead of doing some ball work on the pitch Ronaldo trained in the gym alongside fellow Portugal international Fabio Coentrao. 
Ronaldo completed 90 minutes for Madrid in their 3-1 La Liga win over Osasuna in Saturday, scoring his 14th La Liga goal in the process. 
He came through a training session unscathed on Sunday but wasn't seen on the training field at Madrid's training ground on Monday as Zinedine Zidane's men were put through their paces. Read More Ronaldo scored for Madrid against Osasuna on Saturday... (Photo: AFP) ... but missed training on Monday (Photo: Getty Images) 
Madrid are yet to reveal whether Ronaldo missed training because he was injured or if he simply opted to do some gym work instead. 
Madrid resume their European campaign this week when they take on Napoli in the first leg of the Champions League's last 16. 
The defending champions host their Italian opponents on Wednesday night before the return leg in Naples on Tuesday, March 7. poll loading Will Real Madrid retain the Champions League? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
